mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.package_id , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.document_name , t1.document_type , t1.document_category , t1.life_stage , t1.document_author , t1.author_dept , t1.key_word , t1.current_version , t1.last_version , t1.document_state , t1.language_category , t1.secret_level , t1.document_abstract , t1.document_describe , t1.person_liable , t1.participants , t1.document_update_by , t1.document_update_date , t1.belong_project , t1.warehouse_catelog , t1.know_scope , t1.document_label , t1.click_count , t1.download_count , t1.comment_count , t1.evaluate_score , t1.share_count , t1.liked_count , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 , t1.document_url from document_item t1 where t1.package_id = #{pid}

select t1.id , t1.package_id , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.document_name , t1.document_type , t1.document_category , t1.life_stage , t1.document_author , t1.author_dept , t1.key_word , t1.current_version , t1.last_version , t1.document_state , t1.language_category , t1.secret_level , t1.document_abstract , t1.document_describe , t1.person_liable , t1.participants , t1.document_update_by , t1.document_update_date , t1.belong_project , t1.warehouse_catelog , t1.know_scope , t1.document_label , t1.click_count , t1.download_count , t1.comment_count , t1.evaluate_score , t1.share_count , t1.liked_count , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 , t1.document_url from document_item t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.PACKAGE_ID =#{bean.packageId}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.DOCUMENT_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.documentName}),'%')
and t1.DOCUMENT_TYPE in (#{bean.documentType})
and t1.DOCUMENT_CATEGORY in (#{bean.documentCategory})
and t1.LIFE_STAGE in (#{bean.lifeStage})
and t1.DOCUMENT_AUTHOR like concat(concat('%',#{bean.documentAuthor}),'%')
and t1.AUTHOR_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.authorDept}),'%')
and t1.KEY_WORD like concat(concat('%',#{bean.keyWord}),'%')
and t1.CURRENT_VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.currentVersion}),'%')
and t1.LAST_VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastVersion}),'%')
and t1.DOCUMENT_STATE in (#{bean.documentState})
and t1.LANGUAGE_CATEGORY in (#{bean.languageCategory})
and t1.SECRET_LEVEL in (#{bean.secretLevel})
and t1.DOCUMENT_ABSTRACT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.documentAbstract}),'%')
and t1.DOCUMENT_DESCRIBE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.documentDescribe}),'%')
and t1.PERSON_LIABLE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.personLiable}),'%')
and t1.PARTICIPANTS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.participants}),'%')
and t1.DOCUMENT_UPDATE_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.documentUpdateBy}),'%')
and t1.DOCUMENT_UPDATE_DATE >= #{bean.documentUpdateDateBegin}
and t1.DOCUMENT_UPDATE_DATE <= #{bean.documentUpdateDateEnd}
and t1.BELONG_PROJECT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.belongProject}),'%')
and t1.WAREHOUSE_CATELOG like concat(concat('%',#{bean.warehouseCatelog}),'%')
and t1.KNOW_SCOPE in (#{bean.knowScope})
and t1.DOCUMENT_LABEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.documentLabel}),'%')
and t1.CLICK_COUNT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.clickCount}),'%')
and t1.DOWNLOAD_COUNT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.downloadCount}),'%')
and t1.COMMENT_COUNT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.commentCount}),'%')
and t1.EVALUATE_SCORE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.evaluateScore}),'%')
and t1.SHARE_COUNT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.shareCount}),'%')
and t1.LIKED_COUNT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.likedCount}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_21 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute21}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_22 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute22}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_23 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute23}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute24}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_25 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute25}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_26 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute26}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_27 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute27}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
and t1.DOCUMENT_URL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.documentUrl}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.package_id , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.document_name , t1.document_type , t1.document_category , t1.life_stage , t1.document_author , t1.author_dept , t1.key_word , t1.current_version , t1.last_version , t1.document_state , t1.language_category , t1.secret_level , t1.document_abstract , t1.document_describe , t1.person_liable , t1.participants , t1.document_update_by , t1.document_update_date , t1.belong_project , t1.warehouse_catelog , t1.know_scope , t1.document_label , t1.click_count , t1.download_count , t1.comment_count , t1.evaluate_score , t1.share_count , t1.liked_count , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 , t1.document_url from (select * from document_item t where t.PACKAGE_ID= #{bean.packageId}) t1

select t1.id , t1.package_id , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.document_name , t1.document_type , t1.document_category , t1.life_stage , t1.document_author , t1.author_dept , t1.key_word , t1.current_version , t1.last_version , t1.document_state , t1.language_category , t1.secret_level , t1.document_abstract , t1.document_describe , t1.person_liable , t1.participants , t1.document_update_by , t1.document_update_date , t1.belong_project , t1.warehouse_catelog , t1.know_scope , t1.document_label , t1.click_count , t1.download_count , t1.comment_count , t1.evaluate_score , t1.share_count , t1.liked_count , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 , t1.document_url from document_item t1 where t1.id = #{id}

package_id,

creation_date,
last_updated_by,

participants,
document_update_by,
document_update_date,
belong_project,
warehouse_catelog,
know_scope,
document_label,
click_count,
download_count,
comment_count,
evaluate_score,
share_count,
liked_count,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,
attribute_11,

attribute_14,
attribute_15,
attribute_16,

attribute_21,

attribute_24,
attribute_25,
attribute_26,
attribute_27,
attribute_28,
attribute_29,
attribute_30,
document_url,
